title: ReS2:7-8
text: Demonstrate the ability to effectively collaborate and navigate relationships while valuing different and diverse perspectives, abilities, backgrounds, and cultures. (Collaboration)
subject: Social-Emotional Learning
subs: I can advocate for my role within a group as well as for the inclusion of others.
I can identify a relationship building skill that I would like to improve.
I can identify characteristics of positive and negative relationships.
I can offer and receive constructive feedback.
